title: Account security
2fa-description: Enabling two-factor authentication enhances security by adding an extra layer of protection, reducing the risk of unauthorized access to your accounts.

stepOne.title: Generating the one-time code
stepOne.description: At this stage, a one-time code is generated, the value of which is contained in the QR code. This code is used in combination with your usual login details to access your account, adding an extra layer of security.

stepTwo.title: Use the code generated on the authentication application
stepTwo.description: In this step, enter the single-use code generated in the authentication application you have chosen. This code is temporary and will be valid for one use only.
